title: BiteExpress
subtitle: E-commerce Food Delivery Platform
shortDescription: Craving something delicious? BiteExpress delivers your favorite meals quick, easy, and secure!
fullDescription: Welcome to BiteExpress, your go-to platform for fast, reliable, and hassle-free food delivery! Explore a wide range of cuisines from local restaurants, place orders seamlessly, and enjoy delicious meals delivered straight to your doorstep. Perfect for food lovers on the go!

title: Hotel Management System
subtitle: HMS Application
shortDescription: A full-stack web application for managing hotel operations, bookings, staff, and guest services with role-based access control.
fullDescription: The Hotel Management System is a full-stack web application designed to streamline hotel operations, including guest bookings, employee management, room allocation, housekeeping tracking, and payments. The system provides a seamless experience for guests and staff, ensuring efficient management of hotel resources.

title: No-Joy-Ai
subtitle: An Ai Chatbot
shortDescription: PidginPal is a fun and interactive AI chatbot that speaks fluent Nigerian Pidgin English.
fullDescription: PidginPal is a fun and interactive AI chatbot that speaks fluent Nigerian Pidgin English.

title: Jsync
subtitle: A file management system
shortDescription: A user-friendly file management system that enables users to securely upload, organize, and manage their files online. Built with React and powered by Appwrite for backend services.
fullDescription: A robust file manager web application built using React and Appwrite. This project allows users to upload, view, download, and manage their files efficiently. It includes user authentication, file metadata management, and a responsive design for seamless user experience.
